subject: Advertising and Marketing
Fashion and Apparel
Uniforms
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: In recent years, locker rooms have become crammed with multiple uniform options in a riot of colors and fabrics. Some see branding opportunities and merchandise sales while others hope to attract recruits.
snippet: In recent years, locker rooms have become crammed with multiple uniform options in a riot of colors and fabrics. Some see branding opportunities and merchandise sales while others hope to attract recruits.
